message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a truly valuable item. I'm open to negotiations, but I need to start with a price that reflects its worth. I'm offering it to you for $950000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you have a limited budget, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm counteroffering at $900000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the current market conditions and my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $875000.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $920000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, so I'm counteroffering at $887500. This is my final concession for now.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I believe we are getting closer. Given the situation, I would like to counteroffer at $880000.

I'm glad we're making progress, Bob. However, I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $900000 is too high, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900000 and $880000, so I'm counteroffering at $890000. This is my last concession.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to counteroffer at $885000.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $900000, Bob. I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I'm counteroffering at $892500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
After careful consideration, I would like to counteroffer at $887500.
